remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的重写应永远不会返回`null`或返回集合，其中包含的元素将是`null`。Overrides of this property should never return `null` or return an collection that contains an element that is `null`. 如果定义不包含必需的元数据，返回一个空集合相反。If the definition does not contain required metadata, return an empty collection instead.
